about_the_game:
Purchase one game and play five content!

This game consists of two large scripts and three additional content!



The Legend of the Warrior Slaying the Dragon "tells the classic epic adventure story of the demonic warriors fighting against the demon king and resisting human warriors! (The game adopts a classic first person combat perspective)



The warriors of the human world have repeatedly attacked the demon world. In order to defend their homeland, the prince and princess of the demon world embark on incredible adventures! Not only should we eliminate the reactionary forces in the Demon Realm, but we must also unite with the King of the Demon Realm to counter the incoming human warriors! However, the incoming human warrior turned out to be the Luna team!?



The Chronicles of Eternal Fantasy tells the story of the Dark Emperor ruling the human world, where a group of young men and girls rise up in rebellion and ultimately overthrow the emperor's rule? It's up to you to decide everything! (The game adopts a classic horizontal mode combat perspective)



The Dark Emperor summoned a large number of monsters from hell, which were scattered around the world, and human survival was in jeopardy! For this reason, humans have established resistance armies, but they have repeatedly failed. And you will play a group of homeless young men and girls, join the rebel army, and gradually overthrow the emperor's rule! However, one of your teammates is actually the new emperor!?



Three additional content, as long as the main script of the game is cleared, it can be permanently unlocked!

Whether it's the sequel to "Legend of the Warrior Slaying the Dragon" or the "Luna Prequel" that tells the stories of Rhine, Anning, and the Anas Demon Clan!

Continue with 'Eternal Fantasy Wars' and tell the story of' Rebirth of the Soul ', which tells the story of another hellish world fighting against the Emperor of Hell!

Both can make the plot of the first two scripts more rich and full.

Also, you can play the final additional content of the game, "Lili Adventure"!

Experience the delicate emotions of young boys and girls on campus, the warmth and kinship between father and daughter, and reveal the origins of many NPCs in "Eternal Fantasy: War", as well as the initial story of the Dark Emperor!



All the above content does not require additional purchase of DLC or any form of secondary payment! One purchase, all owned!
detailed_description:
Purchase one game and play five content!

This game consists of two large scripts and three additional content!



The Legend of the Warrior Slaying the Dragon "tells the classic epic adventure story of the demonic warriors fighting against the demon king and resisting human warriors! (The game adopts a classic first person combat perspective)



The warriors of the human world have repeatedly attacked the demon world. In order to defend their homeland, the prince and princess of the demon world embark on incredible adventures! Not only should we eliminate the reactionary forces in the Demon Realm, but we must also unite with the King of the Demon Realm to counter the incoming human warriors! However, the incoming human warrior turned out to be the Luna team!?



The Chronicles of Eternal Fantasy tells the story of the Dark Emperor ruling the human world, where a group of young men and girls rise up in rebellion and ultimately overthrow the emperor's rule? It's up to you to decide everything! (The game adopts a classic horizontal mode combat perspective)



The Dark Emperor summoned a large number of monsters from hell, which were scattered around the world, and human survival was in jeopardy! For this reason, humans have established resistance armies, but they have repeatedly failed. And you will play a group of homeless young men and girls, join the rebel army, and gradually overthrow the emperor's rule! However, one of your teammates is actually the new emperor!?



Three additional content, as long as the main script of the game is cleared, it can be permanently unlocked!

Whether it's the sequel to "Legend of the Warrior Slaying the Dragon" or the "Luna Prequel" that tells the stories of Rhine, Anning, and the Anas Demon Clan!

Continue with 'Eternal Fantasy Wars' and tell the story of' Rebirth of the Soul ', which tells the story of another hellish world fighting against the Emperor of Hell!

Both can make the plot of the first two scripts more rich and full.

Also, you can play the final additional content of the game, "Lili Adventure"!

Experience the delicate emotions of young boys and girls on campus, the warmth and kinship between father and daughter, and reveal the origins of many NPCs in "Eternal Fantasy: War", as well as the initial story of the Dark Emperor!



All the above content does not require additional purchase of DLC or any form of secondary payment! One purchase, all owned!
legal_notice:
This game is independently produced by Alobi. Except for this platform (Steam), no other platform is authorized to sell and distribute for profit or non-profit!

I hereby declare that the game purchased and downloaded from any platform other than Steam has nothing to do with me, regardless of any dispute!
name: 勇者屠龙 之 永恒幻想

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: 勇者屠龙 之 永恒幻想 - $11.99

package_groups.title: Buy 勇者屠龙 之 永恒幻想

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7-11（64位）
  • Processor: 英特尔 Core i5 750
  • Memory: 最低4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: JRY0215 Digital
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 瑞昱 ALC888
  • VR Support: 不支持
  • Additional Notes: 以上配置仅供参考，一般来说只要内存不低于4G，操作系统至少为WINDOWS 7-11（64位）及以上的版本，就可以正常游戏。
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7-11（64位）
  • Processor: 英特尔 Core i5-12400F
  • Memory: 推荐8-16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 瑞昱 ALC888 及以上
  • VR Support: 不支持
  • Additional Notes: 以上配置仅供参考，一般来说只要内存不低于4G，操作系统至少为WINDOWS 7-11（64位）及以上的版本，就可以正常游戏。

short_description: A turn based RPG game! Players will use the traditional RPG game mode to play two major scripts and three additional content. Players will follow the plot to encounter various events, defeat various bosses, explore different worlds, and welcome friends who love traditional RPGs to play!
